common_0225_sitappa_a_01:
Don’t you get it?! If you join Team Star, you can
shine as bright as anybody![VAR 0114(002D)]
common_0225_sitappa_b_01:
Seriously, what’s with you? Don’t you wanna
burn bright with awesome friends like us?[VAR 0114(002E)]
common_0225_sitappa_a_02:
Look—we’ve got a quota we’re supposed to fill
for new members, so just sign up already![VAR 0114(002D)]
common_0225_sitappa_b_02: Huh? You want in on this, too?[VAR 0114(002E)]
common_0225_sitappa_b_03:
If you’re here to sign up, we’ll get to you next!
We’ve nearly got this one in the bag![VAR 0114(002E)]
common_0225_sitappa_a_03:
We’re Team Star, kid. We burn too bright to even
look at directly! But you knew that, right?[VAR 0114(002D)]
common_0225_sitappa_a_04:
So you know exactly who you’re messing with,
and you’re still coming at us with that attitude?\c
You’re scary, kid. If you joined Team Star, you’d
be looking down from the top in no time![VAR 0114(002D)]
common_0225_sitappa_a_05:
Ugh, another ignorant little nobody...\c
Here I’m finally part of Team Star, and still I get
no respect? I gotta work my way up the ranks...[VAR 0114(002D)]
common_0225_sitappa_b_04:
Hey—we can’t just let something like this slide!\c
The honor of our team’s on the line, so we’ve got
no real choice but to battle, yeah?[VAR 0114(002E)]
common_0225_sitappa_a_06:
That’s true! You keep watch on that little four-
eyes over there![VAR 0114(002D)]
common_0225_sitappa_a_07:
I’ll make sure this fresh-faced nobody ends up
seeing stars![VAR 0114(002D)]
common_0225_sitappa_a_08:
Urk, why’s a nobody like you so good at battling,
anyway? That’s just not right...[VAR 0114(002D)]
common_0225_sitappa_b_06:
Does that mean I gotta battle this kid now since
I’m higher up Team Star’s ranks?![VAR 0114(002E)]
common_0225_rival_01: Pero bueno! What do you think you’re doing?![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0225_sitappa_a_09: Ugh! It’s that student council dweeb![VAR 0114(002D)]
common_0225_sitappa_b_07: She’s gonna report us if we don’t book it...[VAR 0114(002E)]
common_0225_rival_03:
You don’t have to go find randos to battle! You’ll
have all the battles you’ll ever need...with me![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0225_select_04: It was those Team Star punks...
common_0225_rival_04:
Wait—THEY picked a fight with YOU? Wow, I
read that way wrong! Sorry![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0225_rival_05:
I get it now. You two have got Team Star written
all over you for sure!\c
I bet you were trying to pressure people into
signing up again, weren’t you?[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0225_sitappa_b_08: Ah, hi. We weren’t...not doing that.[VAR 0114(002E)]
common_0225_rival_06:
Well, that explains it.\c
As head of the student council, stopping this
type of nonsense would normally be MY job...[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0225_rival_07:
But this is also the perfect chance for you to try
my amazing and ultra-rare gift to you![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0225_rival_19:
With this Tera Orb, you can [VAR COLOR(0006)]Terastallize[VAR COLOR(0000)] your
Pokémon during battle![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0225_rival_20:
Let’s see. After it Terastallizes, I’m pretty sure
your [VAR PKNAME(0001)] will beee...[VAR iCOLOR2(0002,0000)][VAR TYPE(0002)] type![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0225_rival_08:
Normally you’ve gotta take special classes to be
able to get one of these Tera Orbs, but I put in\r
a good word for you![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0225_rival_09:
Now, time to give it a whirl! You’ll learn to use it
faster in battle than if I just explain it to you![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0225_sitappa_b_09:
Wait, what? You want this kid to practice whaling
on us with h[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0202)]iser Tera Pokémon, is that it?[VAR 0114(002E)]
common_0225_rival_10: Got a problem? You wanna battle me instead?[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0225_sitappa_b_10:
Hnnng... Never mind! I’ll take my chances with
the new kid![VAR 0114(002E)]
common_0225_rival_22:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Nice, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]! You pulled
off\r
Terastallizing\r
no problem![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0225_rival_23:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Nice, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]! You didn’t
even\r
have\r
to\r
bother\r
Terastallizing\r
your Pokémon![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0225_rival_24:
Moves of your Pokémon’s Tera Type will hit even
harder when it’s Terastallized, y’know![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0225_rival_25:
Sometimes you’ll find a Pokémon whose Tera
Type is totally different from its usual type. That\r
difference can open up your strategic options!\c
Gotta charge your Tera Orb at a Pokémon Center
after every use by healing up your team, though.[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0225_sitappa_b_11:
W-well... I’ll be on my merry way, then, yeah?
Hasta la vistaaarrr! ☆[VAR 0114(002E)]
common_0225_rival_14:
So, yeah—Team Star is basically a group of
students that like to kick up trouble.[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0225_rival_15:
They hardly ever show up to class, and when they
get together in groups, they’re a real headache.\c
Even the teachers don’t know what to do with
’em, from what I hear...[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0225_rival_16:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Awww, look at you, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]!
Already\r
becoming\r
a big\r
hero\r
around campus![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0225_rival_17:
I don’t think I’ve seen that girl around. Maybe
she’s a new transfer, like you...\c
That Eevee bag, though! Love that fluff![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0225_rival_18:
Anyway, seems like the trouble’s died down, so
we’d better book it up to school!\c
Get ready to climb the worst staircase in
the world![VAR 0114(0004)]
